_header: Man by any side ere thou begin
_description: Spiritual advice — a three line fragment

NLS1931.Transcription:
Man by any syd or thou bygynan sy thou haue no nyd to pleynbut
                    louk what stat that thou…
NLS1931.Facsimiles:
Hardman,  Phillipa. 
             The Heege Manuscript: A Facsimile of National Library of Scotland MS
                Advocates 19.3.1.
         Leeds Texts and Monographs, n.s. 16. Leeds: School of English,
            2000.
